Perceptor::

Perceptor smiled "The I have to sedate you, Maxima, this will be 
painfull..."

Perceptor tied Maxima in the table, and shot a sedate, soon Maxima  
would be sleep and he...would create... an art piece of war-bot.

"Where the pist is that Femme?" hissed annoyed Perceptor.
